ValidationRule.description: The Program Engagement End Date must fall within the Program Start and End Dates when specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(EndDate__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Program__r.StartDate__c)), EndDate__c < Program__r.StartDate__c ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(EndDate__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Program__r.EndDate__c)), EndDate__c > Program__r.EndDate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select an end date that's on or after the program start date and on or before the program end date.
